author: delmo20
body:
I have been around long enough to see the inflation of the 70s, hunt brothers corning silver, S&L crisis, the dot com bubble, participated in the housing bubble , participated in the Bakken oil bubble  and the one thing all those crisis have in common is the Government was involved in inflating and bursting of all those bubbles. I support everything you are doing and wish you luck but please be very careful. What I have seen in all those crisis is very few make money and the majority get burned. Just a word of caution that's all.

My belief is, the TPTB is behind it all and are doing very deceptive things to pass financial regulations. So they can take more control. There have been many movements that have tried to break TPTB and most have failed. The ones that were successful are because TPTB wanted it that way.

BE STRONG FIGHT ON YOUNG BUCK!!!!

author: KnowledgeGod
body:
FOMO is never a good thing to have when looking to make a trade.. you missed the Mara run but should monitor for any pullback.. once you start chasing you throw all common sense out of the window and start making risky trades with high potential downside.. if you’re very bullish long-term on MARA/BTC you should look into a call debit spread for a further out date(at least February) for a more conservative option with less downside.. 

my first option trade back in the summer I did a random nio call and made $ but it was all luck and I had 0 clue what I was doing then.. do some other cheaper naked calls to get a taste of what to expect vs. an expensive Mara option with IV out the ass.. some swings I’m in are SDC 12c 2/19 and GLW 40c 3/19 if you need an idea or two..
